content: each chain across ond stitch in from the edge of 30 ch1 turn the d-ring insert the needle this pattern & anything produced from it may not be used for commercial purposes you may row 37 single_crochet in each chain across through the top loops of the not sell this pattern or any item you make from 30 do not fasten_off except to stitch nearest the end of the d- it both the pattern & product are protected under the following creative commons license change color join new color with ring the yarn end goes under attribution-noncommercial-noderivs 2 0 slip_stitch place stitch marker in last single_crochet the d-ring while the first stitch to mark start of side row 1 is at the outside edge bring the pdxwoman email@gmail com pdxwoman wordpress com oct 23 2008
